author: lehors
msg: changed load() to leave the buffer untouched when the reader returns
None of the code handles the -1 offset it was setting in
this case, so it led to an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
An alternative would be to loop over read() as long as nothing is returned,
this would mean load would be blocking, which doesn't seem like the right
thing to do. On the other hand, we're probably blocking just one level higher
now, so it isn't much better.

author: lehors
msg: range package was renamed ranges in DOM Level 2 Rec
